name: Good Soup MF
description:
Improve your chopstick handling skills with Good Soup MF! 
Grab a pair of chopsticks, a gamepad and get ready to eat some weird virtual noodles (also includes danger noodles). 

Press A to skip the tutorial


Enjoy Good Soup MF!

Made in 2 days  by Tatiana Vilela dos Santos for the ALT CTRL AT HOME JAM
Music loops extracted from 8 Bit Weapon's Samurai Princess
